reviews.title: great stay
reviews.text: Hotel is been fully renovated and is situated in Becici, 2km from Budva. Its got its own private beach and good size swimmingpool.

reviews.title: Could do better.
reviews.text: Hotel is very popular with Russian tourist groups but it's very quiet and peaceful yet not far from the main attractions. The best side of the hotel is the food, if you are going on a half board package you will enjoy organic taste of food in the hotel restaurant. All the compliments to kitchen staff, very friendly and helpful when needed. The hotel exceeded my expetations and would gladly return there anytime.
